comment: One of the absolute WORST professors I've had as a senior at KSU. Rude, condescending, terrible. Class is hilariously easy however so I guess that was a plus

Best professor I've had so far at KSU.  She is super funny and engaging.  She also genuinely cares and gives amazing feedback on all projects- really goes the extra mile.  Easy A if you do your work but not a pushover,  show up to class without your project or text during lecture you will get called out.

My all-time favorite professor. If you are interested in health by any means, TAKE HER. Dr. Petrillo is so willing to work with you and help you succeed in college and in her courses. She is beyond amazing and I'm already excited to take my third class with her. Yes, you need to study and work for your A in here (but remember you're in college)!
She make family health and sexuality something easy to talk about. She is so much fun, and loves for the class to participate. I would take her again, and totally say to give her a try.
She makes Family Health and Sexuality fun. She will make jokes, but also knows what she is talking about. She wants everyone to do well. She is passionate about teaching.

Dr. Petrillo is an amazing professor. You will always get a good laugh in her class and she really cares about her students. The course materials are thorough but she makes them interesting. One of the best professors at Kennesw.
Dr. Petrillo is great... very interesting class. She takes attendance, but if you have a legit excuse to miss she won't penalize you. Take her class!!

Awesome class and professor!!!! You want to take her! She's hilarious and very knowledgable about content. She is very approachable and willing to help or explain material. I highly recommend taking her class
She's awesome!!  You'll definitely work in her class, but you'll really learn the material.

Awesome teacher!!!!!!!! She makes you want to go to class. She is very helpful and is easy to talk to. Make sure you bring your book and syllibus to class. You have to study but she tells you what is on test. I wish I had heard for every class. She is funny  and has a super personality. I highly reccomend her. She actually cares about her students.

Great professor. Tests are multiple choice,fill in the blank, and short answer. Very easy, all info from book or ppts. Some guest speakers and videos. Occasional hw assignments and class discussions. You can only miss 6 classes or you fail. Take the syllabus to every class- she is anal about it. She knows her stuff and you will love her.

Took for FIVE classes: sex ed (GREAT CLASS!), HPS 1000, some health class, and for my both my senior seminar and my internship.  You won't regret taking her.  She's zany as hell, but so warm and open it's unbelievable!  Great prof - even greater person.
She is very nice and have a great sense of humor. Her lectures are interesting and she very helpful when it come to assignments and test. very easy class
She is so cool.... you will have fun with her and she is very easy to talk to

DR. Petrillo is awesome, she is the best teacher I've had since I been at KSU. The test are not hard at all just study and you'll get an A, she gives partial points on test even if you don't know the full answer. Very understanding and willing to help. I wish she taught more hps classes.She's the BEST.

I have had Dr.  Petrillo for four classes and she has always been very helpful and understanding.  I love her laid back teaching style.  You have to study for her tests but as long as you study she is an easy A

Her tests are NOT hard-- come on, it's sex ed! Don't you know about sex by now?! All multiple-choice questions-- a "gimme" class. But her teaching style was on the lame side, and she does tend to spout her opinions about things (eg., abortion, OJ Simpson) and that gets tiresome. She's not as bright as she seems to think, but nice person in general.

she was awesome!loved her... you do have to study to do goood on the test but the test are all about sex so it is something fun and interesting! she is also very easy to talk to and most of the classes are just open discussion! Take her!

Don't take this class, she is very bias and full of herself. She needs to get a real job, then maybe she'll understand the reality of teaching Health Promotion. Her tests are very hard and unrelated to class material. She makes this fluff-class more difficult than it really is. Don't take!
No Comments
